citeinfo.origin: National Park Service Geologic Resource Evaluation (GRE) program
citeinfo.title: Digital Source Map Information Table of Appomattox Court House National Historical Park and Vicinity, Virginia (NPS, GRD, GRE, APCO, APCOMAP)

citeinfo.origin: National Park Service Geologic Resource Evaluation (GRE) program
citeinfo.title: Digital Geologic Map of Appomattox Court House National Historical Park and Vicinity, Virginia

descript.abstract: The Digital Source Map Information (MAP) Table consists of information concerning the source maps(s)/source data pertaining to related digital geologic data produced for Appomattox Court House National Historical Park. The data were completed as a component of the Geologic Resource Evaluation (GRE) program, a National Park Service (NPS) Inventory and Monitoring (I&M) funded program that is administered by the NPS Geologic Resources Division (GRD). The data were attributed as per the NPS GRE Geology-GIS Geodatabase Data Model v. 1.4. (available at: http://science.nature.nps.gov/im/inventory/geology/GeologyGISDataModel.cfm). The data is available as a table in a 9.1 personal geodatabase (apco_geology.mdb). The table is also available as a table export (.E00) file (APCOMAP.E00), and as a DBASEIV (.DBF) table file (APCOMAP.DBF).
descript.purpose: Data intended to assist NPS personnel in the protection and management of Appomattox Court House National Historical Park.
descript.supplinf: This dataset is just one component of the Digital Geologic Map of Appomattox Court House National Historical Park and Vicinity, Virginia. The data layers (feature classes) that comprise the Digital Geologic Map of Appomattox Court House National Historical Park and Vicinity, Virginia include: APCODKE (Linear Dikes), APCOFLT (Faults), APCOGLG (Geologic Units) and APCOGLGA (Geologic Contacts). There are three additional ancillary map components, the Geologic Unit Information (APCOGLG1) Table, the Source Map Information (APCOMAP) Table and the Map Help File (apco_geology.hlp). Refer to the NPS GRE Geology-GIS Geodatabase Data Model v. 1.4 (available at: http://science.nature.nps.gov/im/inventory/geology/GeologyGISDataModel.cfm) for detailed table specifications including attribute field parameters, definitions and domains, and relationship classes.

idinfo.useconst: Not for use at scale greater than 1:500,000 (source map scale). The digital data is of limited use as GIS data as the source scale, 1:500,000, is very small-scale. Feature positional accuracy maybe as high as 417'(127 meters) of the feature's mapped position..
idinfo.datacred: Andrea Croskrey and Georgia Hybels (NPS Geologic Resources Division)
idinfo.native: ESRI ArcGIS 9.1 and Microsoft Windows XP

attracc.attraccr: Attribution was derived and checked with the source map(s). Attribution was checked (QCd) for errors. Users of this data are advised to FULLY and CAREFULLY READ the "DISTRIBUTION LIABILITY" section of this metadata before using the data.

dataqual.logic: GIS data in 9.1 personal geodatabase (.MDB), table export (.E00) file and DBASEIV (.DBF) table file formats.
dataqual.complete: Data is considered complete to the extent of the source map(s).

citeinfo.title: Digital Representation of the 1993 Geologic Map of Virginia

pubinfo.publish: Virginia Department of Mines, Minerals and Energy, Division of Mineral Resources (VDMR)

srcinfo.srccontr: Table attribution was derived from source map(s) text and notes.

procstep.procdesc: Table attribution was derived and checked using the source map(s). Relationship classes were also used to ensure attribution consistency. See the NPS GRE Geology-GIS Geodatabase Data Model v. 1.4 (available at http://science.nature.nps.gov/im/inventory/geology/GeologyGISDataModel.cfm) for more details. Tables were exported from the geodatabase to INFO table and DBASEIV (.DBF) formats.

overview.eaover: Refer to the NPS GRE Geology-GIS Geodatabase Data Model v. 1.4. (available at http://science.nature.nps.gov/im/inventory/geology/GeologyGISDataModel.cfm) for detailed table attribute field definitions as well as attribute field coded domain values.
overview.eadetcit: NPS GRE Geology-GIS Geodatabase Data Model v. 1.4. (available at: http://science.nature.nps.gov/im/inventory/geology/GeologyGISDataModel.cfm)

cntinfo.cntinst: GRE data are available at the NPS Data Store: http://science.nature.nps.gov/nrdata

distinfo.resdesc: GIS map data available in APCOGDB.ZIP (9.1 personal geodatabase (.MDB) file), APCOCOV.ZIP (table export (.E00) file) or APCOSHP.ZIP (DBASEIV (.DBF) table file)
distinfo.distliab:
The National Park Service shall not be held liable for improper or incorrect use of the data described and/or contained herein. These data and related graphics are not legal documents and are not intended to be used as such.
The information contained in these data is dynamic and may change over time. The data are not better than the original sources from which they were derived. It is the responsibility of the data user to use the data appropriately and consistent within the limitations of geospatial data in general and these data in particular. The related graphics are intended to aid the data user in acquiring relevant data; it is not appropriate to use the related graphics as data.
The National Park Service gives no warranty, expressed or implied, as to the accuracy, reliability, or completeness of these data. It is strongly recommended that these data are directly acquired from an NPS server and not indirectly through other sources which may have changed the data in some way. Although these data have been processed successfully on a computer system at the National Park Service, no warranty, expressed or implied is made regarding the utility of the data on another system or for general scientific purposes, nor shall the act of distribution constitute any such warranty. This disclaimer applies to both to individual use of the data and aggregate use with other data.

onlinopt.accinstr: Download the digital geologic-GIS map (Larger Work Citation) metadata (APCO_GREMAP.XML) or the .ZIP download file (APCOGDB.ZIP) with the personal geodatabase (.MDB) file containing the table.
Download the digital geologic-GIS map (Larger Work Citation) metadata (APCO_GREMAP.XML) or the .ZIP download file (APCOCOV.ZIP) with the table export (.E00) file.
Download the digital geologic-GIS map (Larger Work Citation) metadata (APCO_GREMAP.XML) or the .ZIP download file (APCOSHP.ZIP) with the DBASEIV (.DBF) table file.
